fullPageStatus.noAccessChatModes: It appears you do not have access to any chat modes.
fullPageStatus.requestAccess1: The platform is currently being piloted by IM and field ICT communities. We are working hard to open the service as soon as possible during 2025. If you wish to express your interest for an early access, please register
fullPageStatus.requestAccess2: We will be in touch when we are ready to open access.
fullPageStatus.existingAccess: If you are a user with existing access, try reloading the page or clearing your cache and cookies to resolve the issue.
fullPageStatus.technicalIssues: We're experiencing some technical issues loading essential data. Please try again in a few moments.
fullPageStatus.assistance: If the problem persists, please open a support ticket via the ICRC Services Portal for assistance.
fullPageStatus.errorProcessingRequest: Error processing request. Please try again.
